attributes.action: stop the banks charging for basic current accounts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: every penny we pay into our bank accounts is used by the banks to invest and make profits for themselvs(that is why we recive intrest on our investments)therefore i belive its compleatly wrong and unfair to charge customers a monthly fee for a basic bank account.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
